Landing.hero_title_html: Quality and Freshness for Your Latino Business
Landing.hero_subtitle_html:
The Authentic Flavor Your Chicago Business Demands
Delivered with Reliability
Landing.problem_subtitle: The headaches every Latino business owner knows...
Landing.problem_1_desc: Tired of avocados arriving bruised, peppers without the right heat, or suppliers who don't know the difference between a jalape√±o and a serrano.
Landing.problem_2_desc: The difficulty of finding fresh tomatillos, cilantro that smells 'real', or bananas at the exact point of ripeness when you need them.
Landing.problem_3_desc: Suppliers who don't understand you, don't speak your language, and don't understand the specific needs of your Latino business.
Landing.agitation_title: Do You Know What This is Costing Your Business?
Landing.agitation_subtitle: Every day that passes with mediocre suppliers, your reputation and profits are at risk
Landing.agitation_point1_desc: Spoilage from poor quality products is money coming directly out of your pocket. Every rotten avocado, every wilted bunch of cilantro.
Landing.agitation_point2_desc: Your customers notice. A bad ingredient ruins the flavor of your dishes and the trust you've worked so hard to build in the community.
Landing.agitation_point3_desc: You waste time and energy on calls and complaints, instead of serving your people and growing your business as you deserve.
Landing.agitation_box_title: How Much is NOT Having a Reliable Partner Costing You?
Landing.agitation_box_desc: While you continue to struggle with mediocre suppliers, your competitors are growing with quality products.
Landing.bridge_subtitle: Imagine the transformation of your business
Landing.bridge_before_1: Praying the order arrives complete and on time
Landing.bridge_before_2: Fighting with suppliers who don't understand you
Landing.bridge_before_3: Products you're not proud of in your business
Landing.bridge_before_4: Customers leaving due to lack of freshness
Landing.bridge_before_5: Sleepless nights thinking about the business
Landing.bridge_after_1: Your business known for having the freshest products in the neighborhood
Landing.bridge_after_2: Customers who return because they know there's quality here
Landing.bridge_after_3: Peace of mind from having a partner who never fails you
Landing.bridge_after_4: More time to care for your family and grow
Landing.bridge_after_5: The pride of serving authentic quality products
Landing.bridge_the_bridge_title: üåâ THE BRIDGE IS THE FRESH HUB
Landing.bridge_the_bridge_desc: We are the direct bridge between the field and your business. We connect your flavor with the quality it deserves.
Landing.solution_subtitle: The Fresh Hub: Your buddy, your pal, your partner in Chicago
Landing.solution_1_desc: Quality products 'like from the ranch', directly from the field to your door. The cilantro smells real, the avocados at their perfect point.
Landing.solution_2_desc: We understand your business because we are one of you. Call and speak directly with Jos√©, who knows the difference between each chili.
Landing.solution_3_desc: Deliveries always on time, so you only have to worry about making your flavor shine and proudly serving your people.
Landing.solution_promise_1: If the product doesn't meet your standard, we'll replace it. No questions asked.
Landing.solution_promise_2: Family Business Serving the Chicago Community
Landing.testimonials_subtitle: The trust of the Latino community in Chicago
Landing.testimonial_1_text: "The Fresh Hub changed my business. My customers always compliment me on the freshness of my vegetables. Since working with them, my supermarket is the benchmark of the neighborhood."
Landing.testimonial_2_text: "Finally, a supplier who understands what I need for my taqueria. The peppers have the perfect heat, the cilantro smells as it should. My tacos have never had so much flavor."
Landing.testimonial_3_text: "I've been in Chicago for 15 years and have never found such a reliable supplier. They speak my language, understand my business, and never fail me. They are my family."
Landing.testimonial_3_location: Restaurante Mi Pueblo, Back of the Yards
Landing.products_section_subtitle: Authentic quality for the taste of your homeland
Landing.product_1_desc: Always at their peak, ready for the guacamole that keeps your customers coming back.
Landing.product_2_desc: Jalape√±os, serranos, poblanos, habaneros. Each with its authentic heat.
Landing.product_3_desc: That smells 'real', with the aroma and flavor your dishes deserve.
Landing.product_4_desc: Firm and fresh, perfect for your traditional green salsas.
Landing.products_section_cta_prompt: Don't see what you need? Ask us!
Landing.offer_desc: Receive a selection of our best avocados, cilantro, tomatillos, and peppers. No commitment, just so you can check the quality we offer.
